about_the_game:
Golel is a first person dungeon crawler RPG with turn based actions and tile-based movement.
Combat is focused on mobility and using the environment to your advantage.
Golel is a disturbing dark fantasy game with horrifying atmosphere.

Demo Scope

The Demo of Golel is the first chapter of the game, and is about 4 hours of gameplay.

STRIDING INTO UNNATURAL REALMS

As a fierce warrior disturbed by your own visions, you willingly chose to venture where no other mortals would dare.
You'll encounter many hostile monsters and environments, but also some non-hostile entities that may or may not help you in your quest.
Each play-through is unique and set different challenges, obstacles and rewards.

FAMILIAR YET NEW WAYS TO DO DUNGEON CRAWLING

You will have to use different skills and rely on the environment to gain an advantage.
You might drop book shelves on a skeleton, kick a zombie into spikes, or flee through narrow passages in the hopes that the monster hunting you cannot follow.
Mobility is important, and you will have to rely on it and tactical use of the environment. Your base stats alone will not save you.

DEEP GAMEPLAY

Character development consists of hundreds of different skills, stats and build paths.
Different skills and weapons, will unlock different play styles.
The world is non linear, and you have some freedom to choose where to travel to.

REPLAYABILITY

Golel has a 30 hours main campaign.
There are many combinations of skills, weapons and attributes, that allow for many different play styles.
Every weapon has it's own combat talents and tactics.

You can be a spell caster, or a mix of both a fighter and a spell caster.
This allows to finish the campaign in many different ways.

Some elements are random generated, while others are hand tailored to provide a unique level design.
In addition, a completely procedural generated challenge mode can be played endlessly after finishing the main campaign.

content_descriptors.notes: Dark atmosphere, some blood when hitting enemies.

  • Graphics: 4 GB at 1080p
  • VR Support: Meta Quest, Valve Index
